rawConfiguration.text:
![MariaDB logo](https://mariadb.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/mariadb-logo-vert_blue-transparent.png)

## Overview

[MariaDB](https://www.mysql.com/) MariaDB Server is one of the most popular open source relational databases. Itâ€™s made by the original developers of MySQL and guaranteed to stay open source. It is part of most cloud offerings and the default in most Linux distributions.

It is built upon the values of performance, stability, and openness, and MariaDB Foundation ensures contributions will be accepted on technical merit. Recent new functionality includes advanced clustering with Galera Cluster 4, compatibility features with Oracle Database and Temporal Data Tables, allowing one to query the data as it stood at any point in the past.

---

## About this dashboard

* For information on the MariaDB on-host integration, please visit the documentation [here](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/).
* To view the source code, please visit the [nri-mysql repository](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql).
* Use the `Node` variable at the top of this page to filter your results.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
 latest(entity.name) AS 'Node'
FACET 
  mysql.hostname AS 'Hostname',
  mysql.clusterNodeType AS 'Node Type',
  mysql.port AS 'TCP Port',
  mysql.version AS 'MariaDB Version',
  mysql.edition AS 'MariaDB Edition'
WHERE metricName = 'mysql.node.net.maxUsedConnections' AND entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Database Connections

Active connections and connection attempts per second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
 latest(mysql.node.net.threadsConnected) AS 'Active Connections'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
 max(mysql.node.net.threadsConnected) AS 'Max Connections'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
 average(mysql.node.net.connectionsPerSecond) AS 'Connections per Second'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Database Operations

`SELECT`, `INSERT`, `UPDATE`, and `DELETE` statements executed per second

## Database Waits

Waits per second due to failed requests for a table lock

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  average(mysql.node.query.insertPerSecond) AS 'Insert Commands', 
  average(mysql.node.query.selectPerSecond) AS 'Select Commands', 
  average(mysql.node.query.updatePerSecond) AS 'Update Comands', 
  average(mysql.node.query.deletePerSecond) AS 'Delete Commands'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  average(mysql.node.tablesLocksWaitedPerSecond) AS 'Waits'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Database Queries

Total queries per second (including stored programs), Percentage of queries per second exceeding the `long_query_time` parameter, and Total queries per second, filtered to only clients (Questions)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  average(mysql.node.query.queriesPerSecond) AS 'Queries'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  (average(mysql.node.query.slowQueriesPerSecond)/average(mysql.node.query.queriesPerSecond))*100 AS 'Slow Query Rate'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  average(mysql.node.query.questionsPerSecond) AS 'Questions'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Database Throughput

Network byte throughput (Sent and Received) and [InnoDB](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/innodb-introduction.html) tables data Read/Write rates

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  average(mysql.node.net.bytesReceivedPerSecond) AS 'Received', 
  average(mysql.node.net.bytesSentPerSecond) AS 'Sent'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  average(mysql.node.innodb.dataReadBytesPerSecond) AS 'Read InnoDB Data', 
  average(mysql.node.innodb.dataWrittenBytesPerSecond) AS 'Write InnoDB Data'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Extended Metrics

This page is populated with the [extended metrics](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/#extended-metrics) collected when enabled in the [integration configuration file](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql/blob/master/mysql-config.yml.sample).

Example:

```yaml
integrations:
- name: nri-mysql
  env:
    EXTENDED_METRICS: true    # Default: false
    ...
```

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.maxExecutionTimeExceededPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Temporary Objects

Temp tables and files created per second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.createdTmpTablesPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Temporary Tables on Disk per Second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.createdTmpDiskTablesPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.createdTmpFilesPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Open Tables Cache

Hits, Misses, and Overflows per second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.tableOpenCacheHitsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.tableOpenCacheMissesPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.tableOpenCacheOverflowsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Thread Cache

Total count and rates for creation and misses

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.threadsCached)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.threadsCreatedPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.threadCacheMissRate)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Query Performance

Various metrics that indicate performance pressure that could be optimized by redesigning queries and/or tables
### Number of joins that perform table scans because they do not use indexes, per second.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.selectFullJoinPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of joins per second that used a range search on a reference table.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.selectFullJoinRangePerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of joins per second without keys that check for key usage after each row.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.selectRangeCheckPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of joins per second that used ranges on the first table.

widgets.title: First Table Range Join per Second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.selectRangePerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of merge passes that the sort algorithm has had to do, per second.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.sortMergePassesPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of sorts per second that were done using ranges.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.sortRangePerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of sorted rows per second.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.sortRowsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of sorts that were done by scanning the table, per second.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(mysql.node.sortScanPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Extended InnoDB Metrics

This page is populated with both the default and [extended InnoDB metrics](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/#extended-innodb-metrics), which are collected when enabled in the [integration configuration file](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql/blob/master/mysql-config.yml.sample).

Example:

```yaml
integrations:
- name: nri-mysql
  env:
    EXTENDED_INNODB_METRICS: true    # Default: false
    ...
```

widgets.title: Buffer Pool Requests vs Reads from Disk (%)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  (latest(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.pagesTotal) - latest(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.pagesFree))/latest(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.pagesTotal)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Table Activity

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.dataReadBytesPerSecond) AS 'Read'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.dataWrittenBytesPerSecond) AS 'Write'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Logs and Table Row Locks

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.logWaitsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: InnoDB Row Lock Waits per second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.rowLockWaitsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  average(mysql.node.innodb.rowLockTimeAvg)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Buffer Pool Pages and Read-Ahead

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.pagesDirty)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Buffer Pool Pages Flushed per second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.pagesFlushedPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.readAheadEvictedPerSecond)/max(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.readAheadPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Buffer Pool Read Requests per second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.readRequestsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.readsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Buffer Pool Write Requests per second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.writeRequestsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.bufferPool.waitFreePerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB `fsync()` Operations, Data, and Redo Log Activity

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.numOpenFiles)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.dataFsyncsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.dataPendingFsyncs)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.dataPendingReads)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.dataPendingWrites)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.logWriteRequestsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.logWritesPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Pages Activity

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.pagesCreatedPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.pagesReadPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.pagesWrittenPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Table Row Activity

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.rowsDeletedPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.rowsInsertedPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.rowsReadPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.innodb.rowsUpdatedPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Extended MyISAM Metrics

This page is populated with the [extended MyISAM metrics](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/#extended-myisam-metrics) collected when enabled in the [integration configuration file](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql/blob/master/mysql-config.yml.sample).

Example:

```yaml
integrations:
- name: nri-mysql
  env:
    EXTENDED_MY_ISAM_METRICS: true    # Default: false
    ...
```

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.myisam.keyCacheUtilization)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.myisam.keyBlocksNotFlushed)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.myisam.keyReadRequestsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.myisam.keyReadsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.myisam.keyWriteRequestsPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.myisam.keyWritesPerSecond)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Extended Cluster Metrics

This page is populated with the [extended cluster metrics](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/#extended-slave-cluster-metrics) collected when `extended metrics` are enabled in the [integration configuration file](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql/blob/master/mysql-config.yml.sample) and the integration has found an active slave node (`mysql.node.cluster.slaveRunning: 1`)

Example:

```yaml
integrations:
- name: nri-mysql
  env:
    EXTENDED_METRICS: true    # Default: false
    ...
```

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  latest(mysql.clusterSlaveIoRunning) AS 'Slave IO Running',
  latest(mysql.clusterSlaveSqlRunning) AS 'Slave SQL Running'
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.relayLogSpace)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
  max(mysql.node.cluster.secondsBehindMaster)
FACET entity.name AS 'Node'
WHERE entity.name IN ( {{mysql_node}} )
TIMESERIES LIMIT MAX

nrqlQuery.query:
FROM Metric SELECT uniques(entity.name, 5)
WHERE metricName = 'mysql.node.net.maxUsedConnections'
SINCE 1 WEEK AGO LIMIT MAX
